name: TibetanVibes-HealingSound-Meditationchimes
0:
”Alexa, open tibetan vibes”
”Alexa, ask tibetan vibes what is this”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tibetan vibes
des:
There’s something comforting about hearing wind chimes among raindrops, distant sirens, and traffic on busy streets. When a storm wakes you up in the middle of the night, the sound of bells can remind you that you’re at home in your cozy bed, and it’s okay to go back to sleep.

Even if you don’t have any outdoor space, you can add the sound of chimes and bells to your home’s ambiance as long as you have Alexa. Wind chimes help to attract positive energy and suppress ill luck. The gentle tinkling sound that emanates from it helps this energy to linger on and meander gently in your space thereby attracting prosperity. Wind chimes are a very popular feng shui cure, and there is a variety of ways you can use them for good feng shui. In fact, wind chimes are one of Feng Shui's most common remedies, used both to suppress and cure negative energy, as well as to add energy where chi is lacking. Nowadays wind chimes are also used in “Garden Therapy.” Sound vibrates the air, which stimulates chi energy. The sound stimulated through wind chimes suppresses the bad chi energies and revitalizes with the good chi energy. A floral, bird, animal, and butterfly motifs are very popular for the garden as they pay homage to the tiny creatures that inhabit your space.

The Skill plays a 3-hour long meditation sound for relaxation. Soothing Sounds to Lift Our Mood… and Productivity


relaxing wind chime blowing in the wind, helps sleep if volume is set just right not to loud not to low. 

For all support queries and questions please write to us - developer@keyringcorp.co
We have also released various Alexa skills Please keep track of all Alexa skills here: https://amzn.to/2VF0FN2


Your reviews motivate us to build wonderful skills like this one. If you have not already, please show your support by sharing your suggestions at info@keyringcorp.co 👨🏻‍💻
We want to hear from you!

Soothing ambiance Koshi Chimes, Rain, Thunder & Wind. This relaxing nature sound Skill creates a peaceful atmosphere for sleep & insomnia, relaxation and a lot of other applications. This skill contains koshi chimes, rain, thunder, thunderstorm and wind sounds. If you have insomnia or a sleep disorder, then this skill can be helpful. Nature sounds are known to reduce stress and anxiety. If you have problems with sleeping this nature skill can help you to relax, you can fall into a deep relaxing sleep. This peaceful ambiance a natural noise, includes white noise winds to help calm your mind. Perfect also as background for massage rooms and offices to stay focussed and concentrated as well as doing homework. I hope you enjoy our Alexa skill.
Best enjoyed with using sleepphones during nights in low volume as background sound or played as underlay with your favourite music.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
